## Checklist

- [ ] Tests pass (`npm run test:run`)
- [ ] Types check (`npm run typecheck`)
- [ ] Lint passes (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Format is correct (`npm run format:check`)
- [ ] TSDoc added/updated for new/changed exports
